bool supportsDirectionMethod () const
 Always returns true. Shapes derived from this class must implement the getPoint() method to return points on a given surface.

 Returns the area of this surface shape.

Protected Attributes

EGS_Float A

Detailed Description

A surface shape.

For convenience, shapes that support the EGS_BaseShape::getPointSourceDirection() method should be derived from this class.

Member Data Documentation

EGS_Float EGS_SurfaceShape::A [protected]

The surface area of this shape.

Derived shapes must set A to their area (or reimplement the area() function).
